sentences.en: "What if I had said no?" "About the apartment, you mean?"
sentences.cn: “我要是说了不呢？”“你是说公寓那件事吗？”

sentences.en: Apartment 46 was a quiet apartment, unlike the one above it.
sentences.cn: 和它楼上的那间不同，46号公寓很安静。

sentences.en: Christina has her own apartment, with her own car.
sentences.cn: 克里斯蒂娜有自己的公寓和汽车。

sentences.en: Gerome tried to talk her into taking an apartment in Paris.
sentences.cn: 杰罗姆试图说服她在巴黎买一套公寓。

sentences.en: He found his brother in a seedy, roach-infested apartment.
sentences.cn: 他发现自己的哥哥住在一套破旧肮脏、蟑螂肆虐的公寓里。

sentences.en: His apartment was the most famous literary salon in Russia.
sentences.cn: 他的公寓是俄国最著名的文学沙龙会所。

sentences.en: I locked myself out of our apartment and had to break in.
sentences.cn: 我把自己锁在了我们的公寓外面，不得不破门而入。

sentences.en: It would never do to have Henry there in her apartment.
sentences.cn: 亨利呆在她的公寓里怎么也不合适。

sentences.en: Once inside her apartment she felt an urge to brush her teeth.
sentences.cn: 一回到自己的公寓，她就有一种想要刷牙的冲动。

sentences.en: She lives in a small apartment.
She went directly to Simon's apartment and knocked on the door.
sentences.cn: 她直奔西蒙的房间，敲了敲门。

sentences.en: Shortly after moving into her apartment, she found a job.
sentences.cn: 搬进公寓不久，她就找到了份工作。

sentences.en: Stevens wrote him a note asking him to come to his apartment.
sentences.cn: 史蒂文斯给他写了张便条，请他去自己的公寓。

sentences.en: The high and low-rise apartment blocks built in the 1960s are crumbling.
sentences.cn: 20世纪60年代建造的高低不一的公寓楼群正在逐渐破损坍塌。

sentences.en: They refused to rent an apartment to an unmarried couple.
sentences.cn: 他们拒绝把公寓租给未婚情侣。

sentences.en: Unknown thieves had forced their way into the apartment.
sentences.cn: 不知名的窃贼破门闯入了公寓。

phrases.tran_cn: 房屋出租；公寓招租；吉屋出租
公寓式饭店；公寓式旅馆
套楼公寓；复式住宅（等于duplex）
n. 一个房间的小公寓住宅

trans.tran_cn: 公寓套房，（总统等要人的）套间
trans.tran_en: a set of rooms on one floor of a large building, where someone lives
